products.title: CBD Hemp Shampoo
description: Experience the perfect blend of plant-based care and powerful CBD infusion with SN CBD Shampoo. Specially formulated to cleanse, hydrate, and soothe the scalp, this shampoo promotes stronger, healthier, and shinier hair—naturally.
Infused with broad-spectrum CBD, nourishing botanicals, and essential oils, it's your new go-to for stress-free scalp care and vibrant hair health.
userManual: Apply a generous amount of SN CBD Shampoo to the scalp and massage gently.
Leave on for 1-2 minutes to let the CBD and botanicals absorb.
Rinse thoroughly. For best results, follow with SN CBD Conditioner.

faq.question: Will this shampoo make me high?
faq.answer: No. Our shampoo uses CBD with 0.0% THC. It is non-psychoactive and completely safe.

faq.question: Can I use this shampoo daily?
faq.answer: Yes! SN CBD Shampoo is gentle enough for daily use, even on sensitive scalps.

faq.question: Is this safe for all hair types?
faq.answer: Absolutely. It's formulated to suit all hair types, including dry, oily, color-treated, curly, or straight hair.

faq.question: Does it help with dandruff?
faq.answer: Yes. The anti-inflammatory and moisturizing properties of CBD, tea tree oil, and aloe vera can help reduce scalp irritation, flakiness, and itchiness.

products.title: CBD Hemp Oil
description: SN CBD Hemp Oil offers a powerful, all-natural solution for daily wellness. Rich in cannabinoids, our hemp oil supports stress relief, restful sleep, and overall balance.
Made with premium broad-spectrum CBD, it’s ideal for sublingual use or adding to food and beverages for a calm, centered lifestyle.
userManual: Take 1 full dropper (1ml) under the tongue.
Use once or twice daily as needed.

products.title: CBD Flowers
description: Our premium CBD Hemp Flowers are hand-trimmed, slow-cured, and rich in terpenes. Ideal for vaping or infusion, they offer a natural way to relax and unwind.
Enjoy the full-spectrum aroma and benefits of the hemp plant—pure and potent.
userManual: Use with a vaporizer or infuse in oils or teas.
Store in a cool, dry place to maintain freshness.
